verbose_text: Studies have demonstrated that some CD8+ and CD4+ T cells can infiltrate inflamed visceral adipose tissue (VAT) and activate M1 macrophages, resulting in the production of a series of cytokines, such as TNF-alphaand IL-6, which contribute to both local and systemic insulin resistance [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: CD4+ T cells can infiltrate inflamed visceral adipose tissue (VAT) and activate M1
